        public void setSize(android.graphics.RectF drawableRect,

        Sets the @Drawable and @PanningView size, this method calls automatically after @PanningView.onMeasure(int, int)}
        Overrides:

        Parameters:
        drawableRect - contains the drawable size info (0, 0, Drawable.getIntrinsicWidth(), Drawable.getIntrinsicHeight())
        viewRect - contains the view size info (0, 0, View.getMeasuredWidth(), View.getMeasuredHeight())
